## Theme.setCategoryStyle() method

Overrides or adds a style to the categoryStyles map.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setCategoryStyle(categoryStyleName: string, categoryStyle: CategoryStyle): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  categoryStyleName | string | The name of the category style. |
|  categoryStyle | CategoryStyle | The category style. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
